article_title: $114 to cross the GWB? Yep. Use our interactive tool to figure out the new tolls
article_text:
If you are going to be driving across or through Port Authority bridges and tunnels, be ready to pay more on Sunday.

Toll prices are scheduled to go up on Dec. 7, the fourth of five annual hikes set by in August 2011. The highest toll will be for trucks crossing the bridge without E-ZPass and at peak times.

That toll? $114.

All of the tolls depend on what kind of vehicle you have and whether you pay with E-ZPass or cash. Driving during peak hours can also make your toll payment more expensive.

Use our tool below to figure out the cost for any vehicle.

Mobile app users, please click here for a full view of the graphic below.

article_summary:
All of the tolls depend on what kind of vehicle you have and whether you pay with E-ZPass or cash.
If you are going to be driving across or through Port Authority bridges and tunnels, be ready to pay more on Sunday.
Toll prices are scheduled to go up on Dec. 7, the fourth of five annual hikes set by in August 2011.
The highest toll will be for trucks crossing the bridge without E-ZPass and at peak times.
Use our tool below to figure out the cost for any vehicle.
